Articles.Content:
Is this mod available yet? Looking in CKAN, cant see it, also RO missing...any ETA?

I do understand it takes time however im wondering when(ish) lol

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-24T19:47:33Z" title="06/24/2015 07:47  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 24, 2015</time> by maceemiller**
Nope, it's not. Don't worry, I'll update the release thread (and it'll be on CKAN) when it is.

>

NathanKell your a legend, you know that right? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
